name: Zero G Golf
description:
Space travel can get quite boring so you have to get creative to pass the time!

Play golf in zero g: Try to hit the right buttons with your balls, but avoid hitting red buttons, or you might end up killing everyone on the spaceship!

3 gamemodes:

Regular: Golf your way through 18 stages by hitting all the right buttons

Time Attack: See how fast you can complete all the stages in a row

One shots: You only get one ball and one chance to make the shot!

Contains 18 stages + 18 "one shot stage remixes"
